scripts.dev:chrome: yarn workspace extension cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome webpack --watch
scripts.dev:firefox: yarn workspace extension cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox webpack --watch
scripts.build:chrome: yarn workspace extension cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome webpack
scripts.build:firefox: yarn workspace extension cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox webpack
scripts.build: yarn workspace extension && yarn run build:chrome && yarn run build:firefox
